jgame.listener

Class GlobalKeyListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.listener.GlobalKeyListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalKeyListener

    public abstract class GlobalKeyListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener
    A listener that listens for a key being pressed anywhere.
    Author:
    William Chargin
